vsParam:
Humph... As the exam is approaching day by day,
Wistyria starts to get uneasier and uneasier...
Yeah... I'm kind of worried about her...

I've got a suggestion.
Let's make an amulet for Wistyria, how about that?
Yup, an amulet to wish her a pass!

She'll calm down even if she's nervous when
taking the exam with this amulet.

Good for you, Sorel! Good idea.
Right, [px]?
Let's insert all our wishes into it.

Yes!
OK, what kind of amulet do you want to make?

Yeah!
What kind of amulet do you want to make?
Let's insert all our wishes into it!

Yes!
OK, what kind of amulet do you want to make?

Yeah!
What kind of amulet do you want to make?

How about using mineral? Father taught me to trust
my wishes into the mineral and they'd come true...

Wow, impressive!
So let's use mineral to make the amulet!

I know where we could find quality mineral.
It's in Ribrum, shall we go there together?

Yeah, thank you, Angelica!
Guys! Let's go collect beautiful mineral there!
